results.name: Continued fraction expansion of 2*x which equals the continued fraction of x (A109168) interleaved with positive even numbers.
example: The continued fraction expansion of x = A109168:
The continued fraction expansion of 2*x = A109170:
which equals the continued fraction of x interleaved with even numbers.
xref: Cf. A109168 (continued fraction of x), A109169 (digits of x), A109171 (digits of 2*x).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 21 2005
